page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: HOUSING. TANG HALL AREA. My house is owned by York City Council. It is the end house of a terrace and is about 40 years old. Inside there is a small kitchen with a pantry, a dining room, and lounge and hall downstairs and upstairs there is a landing, two large bedrooms, one small bedroom and a bathroom with a toilet in it. Outside we have a toilet and a tool shed. There is a back garden and a front garden. Both are covered with grass. Beside me my brother, sister, mum and dad live in the house. The house is very small, especially when we are all in it. There are many houses like mine in the area.
